actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs, S. Rept. 93-1303.

actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: An original bill to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to continue the minting of dollars, half dollars, and quarter dollars bearing the current design and coinage date during calendar year 1975.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to continue the minting of dollars, half-dollars, and quarter-dollars bearing the current design and coinage date during calendar year 1975.

titles.title: An original bill to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to continue the minting of dollars, half dollars, and quarter dollars bearing the current design and coinage date during calendar year 1975.
